snippet: The measure to raise the hourly rate by $1 passed easily on Tuesday, by a margin of 60 percent to 40 percent, pleasing labor leaders and dismaying the business community.
abstract: Measure to raise New Jersey's minimum hourly wage by $1 passes easily, by a margin of 60 percent to 40 percent, pleasing labor leaders and dismaying business community.
lead_paragraph: The measure to raise the hourly rate by $1 passed easily on Tuesday, by a margin of 60 percent to 40 percent, pleasing labor leaders and dismaying the business community.

headline.main: Higher Wage Is Approved in New Jersey
headline.print_headline: Higher Wage Is Approved In New Jersey
